features.featureTitle: Generate a Stack Teacher logo image combining an icon/symbol with a text-based wordmark. The icon should visually represent stacked layers or blocks (evoking knowledge stacks, tech layers, or curriculum phases). The wordmark should read 'Stack Teacher' in a clean, modern, professional font. The overall style must be tech-educational: sharp, credible, and forward-looking, using the existing site color palette (dark backgrounds with accent tones). Produce the logo in a horizontal layout (icon left, text right) and a standalone icon-only variant.

Integrate the generated Stack Teacher logo into the website's sticky header (Layout.tsx) to replace any existing text-only or placeholder brand mark. Use the horizontal (icon + wordmark) variant in the header. Ensure the logo is appropriately sized for the navbar, responsive on mobile (shrinks gracefully or uses icon-only variant on small screens), and links to the home page.
